Boulevard Riyadh City Boulevard Riyadh City is one of the biggest entertainment zones. each of the sub-areas features its own set of activities, restaurants, events, and outlets that are catered to all visitor. The King Fahad National Library The King Fahad National Library represents the new centre of the rapidly changing Olaya District, and stands out clearly from the heterogeneous existing building pattern. Riyadh Zoo Riyadh Zoo is located in Almalaz District, Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It was originally built in 1987 with total area 161,000 m2 , featuring more than 190 kind of animals with three major types, Mammals, Birds and Reptiles, train rides and tour, Restaurant, coffee shop which contains an outdoor setting area, 6 snacks Kiosks, outdoor plaza, prayer halls for both male and female, 10 Toilets, Romanian Theater, Gifts shop, 5D Cinema, Conservation Center, Main fountain and more than 20,000 assorted trees and flowers. The National Museum Park The National Museum of Saudi Arabia is a major national museum in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. it is part of the King Abdulaziz Historical Centre in Riyadh. Al Masmak Palace Museum A vast clay and mud-brick citadel that witnessed the birth of a kingdom, Al Masmak — the word means a high, strong and thick building — serves as a proud reminder of Saudi Arabia’s storied history. Murabba Historical Palace Close to Riyadh’s National Museum you’ll find the beautiful Murabba Palace, the former home and court of King Abdul Aziz, founder of modern Saudi Arabia, and a monument to the city’s captivating past.
